post:
Hello,
We've been around for 5+ years and own & colocate our hardware and networking gear and have our own ARIN / RIPE  issued IPs for our US / EU based locations. 

We've recently added new AMD Ryzen 9 5950X powered hardware to our Los Angeles, California, USA location and would like to share an offer with you.

**Our Site:** https://crowncloud.net/

**Datacenter**
Quadranet - Los Angeles, California, USA (US-West)
Test IP Quadranet: 204.152.203.65 / 2607:fcd0:0:a::1

---

**Ryzen 9 5950X SSD Plan 1**

1 GB RAM
30 GB SSD
2 CPU cores fair share allocation
1 Snapshot Slot (User can restore/create/destroy snapshot from the panel)
KVM based
1 TB Bandwidth per month
1 Gbit/sec uplink
1 IPv4
/64 IPv6


$5/month or $25/semi-annual

**Order Link:**
- Los Angeles, USA - https://crowncloud.net/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=552


---

**Ryzen 9 5950X  SSD Plan 2**
2 GB RAM
40 GB SSD
3 core fair-share access include
1 Snapshot Slot (User can restore/create/destroy snapshot from the panel)
KVM based
2 TB bandwidth per month
1 Gbit/sec uplink
1 IPv4
/64 IPv6

$6/month or $30/semi-annual

**Order Links**
- Los Angeles, USA - https://crowncloud.net/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=553

---

**Ryzen 9 5950X  SSD Plan 3**
3 GB RAM
50 GB SSD
4 core fair-share access include
1 Snapshot Slot (User can restore/create/destroy snapshot from the panel)
KVM based
2 TB bandwidth per month
1 Gbit/sec uplink
1 IPv4
/64 IPv6

$7/month or $35/semi-annual

**Order Links**
- Los Angeles, USA - https://crowncloud.net/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=554



---

**Operating systems:**
We've got 1-click install templates for CentOS 6/7/8/Stream 8, Debian 8/9/10, various Ubuntu(s) upto 20.10, Windows 2012/2016/2019.
Also do note, We do not provide licenses for Windows, the customer is responsible for the license on the machine.

**Other information**
1. SSH Key insert during install support is included
2. In-control panel rDNS support is included
3. Custom ISOs can be requested to be mounted onto your VPS for free as well via ticket.
4. Labels can be setup on VPSes (https://wiki.crowncloud.net/?How_to_set_a_label_on_a_VPS_in_CrownPanel)
5. 2Factor Authentication available in billing/client-area and VPS control panel (https://wiki.crowncloud.net/?2factor_authentication_in_crownpanel)
6. **NEW** A Name can be setup on a snapshot (https://wiki.crowncloud.net/?How_to_Add_Name_to_Snapshots_in_CrownPanel)
